content.raw:
Thanks for all the changes, it's looking nice!

Just some usability nitpicks: 

* the cursor could change as you hover over the headers, so the user knows they're clickable to expand
* the items only expand if you click on the text, but it would be more intuitive if you could click anywhere on the header

Thanks for all the changes, it's looking nice!

Just some usability nitpicks:

  • the cursor could change as you hover over the headers, so the user knows they're clickable to expand
  • the items only expand if you click on the text, but it would be more intuitive if you could click anywhere on the header
